revised_title: Transmission of Sunlight through the Earth's Atmosphere: A Study of Optical and Photographic Values
tldr: The author investigates the transmission of sunlight through the Earth's atmosphere and develops a method to calculate the illuminating value of any part of the visible spectrum on any day at any hour using optical and photographic values of total sunlight. This method allows for the calculation of light that undergoes general absorption and the values of loss of intensity for each ray.
